section.name: CAC_COD_CPTO
section.code:
*<<<< CAC_COD_CPTO IF CAC-COD-CPTO IN CCA-FLD NOT > SPACES GO TO FIN-VAL-CAC-COD-CPTO.
*VAL-COD Valida codigo de tabla MOVE 'TAB' TO TAB-COD-SIST. MOVE 'PSC' TO TAB-COD-TTAB IN TAB. MOVE CAC-COD-CPTO IN CCA-FLD TO TAB-COD-CTAB IN TAB. PERFORM VAL-COD. *>>>>

section.name: CAC_IND_VIGE
section.code:
*<<<< CAC_IND_VIGE IF CAC-IND-VIGE IN CCA-FLD NOT > SPACES GO TO FIN-VAL-CAC-IND-VIGE.
*VAL-COD Valida codigo de tabla MOVE 'TAB' TO TAB-COD-SIST. MOVE 'VIG' TO TAB-COD-TTAB IN TAB. MOVE CAC-IND-VIGE IN CCA-FLD TO TAB-COD-CTAB IN TAB. PERFORM VAL-COD. IF MSG-COD-MENS = 'COD NEX' OR 'COD NVG' MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR. *>>>>

section.name: DBC_GLS_ICLI
section.code: *<<<< DBC_GLS_ICLI IF DBC-NUM-ICLI IN CCA-FLD > ZEROES MOVE DBC-NUM-ICLI IN CCA-FLD TO DBC-NUM-ICLI IN DBC MOVE DBC-IND-ICLI IN CCA-FLD TO DBC-IND-ICLI IN DBC MOVE DBC-GLS-ICLI IN CCA-FLD TO DBC-GLS-ICLI IN DBC MOVE 'DBC-IDC-ICLI' TO FIO-AKEY MOVE FIO-GET-KEY TO FIO-CMND PERFORM SGC-FIO-DBC IF NOT FIO-STAT-OKS MOVE 'SGC' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'CLI NEX' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-DBC-GLS-ICLI ELSE MOVE DBC-NUM-ICLI IN DBC TO WSS-NUM-ICLI IN WSS-VARI MOVE DBC-IND-ICLI IN DBC TO WSS-IND-ICLI IN WSS-VARI MOVE DBC-GLS-ICLI IN DBC TO WSS-GLS-ICLI IN WSS-VARI MOVE DBC-VRF-ICLI IN DBC TO WSS-VRF-ICLI IN WSS-VARI MOVE DBC-CAI-ICLI IN DBC TO WSS-CAI-ICLI IN WSS-VARI MOVE DBC-IIC-ICLI IN DBC TO WSS-IIC-ICLI IN WSS-VARI MOVE DBC-CAI-ICLI IN DBC TO SCR-CAI-ICLI MOVE DBC-IIC-ICLI IN DBC TO SCR-IIC-ICLI. *>>>>

section.name: DBC_NUM_ICLI
section.code: *<<<< DBC_NUM_ICLI IF DBC-NUM-ICLI IN CCA-FLD NOT > ZEROES MOVE SPACES TO SCR-CAI-ICLI IN SCR-VARI MOVE SPACES TO SCR-IIC-ICLI IN SCR-VARI. *>>>>

section.name: FIN_FST_KEY_CCA
section.code: *<<<< FIN_FST_KEY_CCA MOVE -1 TO CAC-COD-CPTO-LEN IN CCA-FLD. *>>>>

section.name: INI_CAC_FEC_FINI
section.code: *<<<< INI_CAC_FEC_FINI MOVE FEC-CHOY-N TO FEC-CHOY. MOVE FEC-VHBL-N TO FEC-VHBL. *>>>>

section.name: INI_CAC_HRA_HINI
section.code: IF CAC-HRA-HINI IN CCA-FLD NOT > ZEROES MOVE ZEROES TO CAC-HRA-HINI IN CCA-FLD GO TO FIN-VAL-CAC-HRA-HINI. IF CAC-HRA-HINI IN CCA-FLD > 235959 MOVE 'SGC' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'HRAINV ' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-CAC-HRA-HINI.

section.name: INI_FRM_FEC_INIS
section.code: *<<<< MOVE FEC-CHOY-N TO FEC-CHOY. MOVE FEC-VHBL-N TO FEC-VHBL. *>>>>

section.name: INI_FRM_HRA_INIS
section.code: IF FRM-HRA-INIS IN CCA-FLD > 235959 MOVE 'SGC' TO MSG-COD-SIST MOVE 'HRAINV ' TO MSG-COD-MENS PERFORM GET-MSG MOVE MSG-GLS-DESC TO FRM-MENS MOVE FRM-SUAR-MAL TO FRM-SUAR GO TO FIN-VAL-FRM-HRA-INIS.
